page.title: 15Industry in West Farnham
page.content: The main centre of industry in Farnham is the Industrial estate in east Farnham. West Farnham is mainly commercial, residential or agricultural.The only Industrial site in Farnham is{Grovebell Industrial {site,}Concept Carpets being the biggest on this site. Other companies are: Woking Tile Warehouse, Masders(Paint), Holemasters(Concrete), Grey Dallen and co.Ltd(Aliminium Frames For Double Glazing).Other companies in West Farnham are: G.A.Days(Building Material),Farnham Glass and Crosby Doors. Along the A31 Hall Aggregates operate quarrying and gravel working. In the past brewing and pottery were major industries in Farnham but both have declined in this century.
